description: I am a Mechanical Engineer from Orlando, Florida.  I wrestled throughout high school and placed sixth in Florida my senior year.
aspects: My favorite part of Lambda Chi is how close you get to all of the awesome brothers.  Also events like Highlighter Party are a ton of fun.
quotes: He answered, "Whether he is a sinner I do not know.  One thing I do know, that though I was blind, now I see." John 9:25
name: Lee Hagood-James
